alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 10 at 10:14PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CHST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Guam. * WHEN...Until 115 AM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1013 PM ChST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
